info.title: Gecko OS
info.author: Nuke
info.details:
Gecko OS 1.07b. See Readme
  
Controls: Use Wii Remote D-Pad or Gamecube Pad in the first port. Region Free options can be set with the config menu before launching the game. 
  
USB Gecko is only required if using WiiRD.
  
Check www.usbgecko.com/forums for support on WiiRD and GeckoOS.
